channel.title: Nerva.co! || New Server 2016 || Flawless Eco! || Need Players! || 24/7 For Real!
channel.description:
[url=http://www.nerva.co/]Nerva – Outwit. Outplay. Outlast.[/url]
Hey everyone! This is a brand new server open to anyone who wants to test out this server I've been developing. You can hate if you'd like, i know this community is good for it, but i'm just here to let players have fun. My donation system isn't even set up! :3:
[B][U]Home![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6ly9CiU.png[/img]
[B][U]Key Rewards![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5KmYUP1.png[/img]
[B][U]Customs![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vUKKs8e.png[/img]
[B][U]Donator only PvM Zone and Skiller zone![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H9Wg6EK.png[/img]
[B][U]Custom Minigames![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HMmNoGX.png[/img]
[B][U]Custom Pk zone![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hovGVoh.png[/img]
[B][U]Many Bosses![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pjSfGfI.png[/img]
[U]Here's a list of other things the server has that wasn't worth taking a thousand screenshots.[/U] *Great remade Runecrafting system *Nice farming *Detailed and In-depth Slayer *Max Cape! *Wilderness Tabs *Fully working Barrows *Godwars fully works *Great herblore system *NO dupes of any kind *Secured and well balanced Eco *Chaos related Multi PK bossing *Game Room; Drop parties, market, thieving, ect *Boss Pets *Supportive of all player types; Pkers, Skillers, and PvMers. *All skills work 100% *Iron Man mode that has been thought out very well *Open staff positions because I've done this 100% by myself and i'm the only staff! *and more including pest control, fight pits, LvlPoint system, in-game drop tables, blah blah blah. :p
[B]So, stop by if you'd like. I tried posting an advert here the other day and was shot down due to lack of media and such but i hope this will get the ball rolling for me. Also, i'd like to mention that for the record i'm not interested in the Competitive side of the whole Rsps community. I just picked this up as a means of entertaining people and trying to teach myself. Hope to see you guys around! Cheers![/B]
[url=http://www.nerva.co/]Nerva – Outwit. Outplay. Outlast.[/url]

item.title: Nerva.co! || New Server 2016 || Flawless Eco! || Need Players! || 24/7 For Real!
item.dc:creator: @Nerva Nerva
item.description:
@Nerva wrote:

Nerva – Outwit. Outplay. Outlast.

Hey everyone! This is a brand new server open to anyone who wants to test out this server I’ve been developing. You can hate if you’d like, i know this community is good for it, but i’m just here to let players have fun. My donation system isn’t even set up! :3:

Home!

6ly9CiU.png781×570

Key Rewards!

5KmYUP1.png780×568

Customs!

vUKKs8e.png780×569

Donator only PvM Zone and Skiller zone!

H9Wg6EK.png782×569

Custom Minigames!

HMmNoGX.png782×569

Custom Pk zone!

hovGVoh.png781×569

Many Bosses!

pjSfGfI.png782×569

Here’s a list of other things the server has that wasn’t worth taking a thousand screenshots.
*Great remade Runecrafting system
*Nice farming
*Detailed and In-depth Slayer
*Max Cape!
*Wilderness Tabs
*Fully working Barrows
*Godwars fully works
*Great herblore system
*NO dupes of any kind
*Secured and well balanced Eco
*Chaos related Multi PK bossing
*Game Room; Drop parties, market, thieving, ect
*Boss Pets
*Supportive of all player types; Pkers, Skillers, and PvMers.
*All skills work 100%
*Iron Man mode that has been thought out very well
*Open staff positions because I’ve done this 100% by myself and i’m the only staff!
*and more including pest control, fight pits, LvlPoint system, in-game drop tables, blah blah blah.

So, stop by if you’d like. I tried posting an advert here the other day and was shot down due to lack of media and such but i hope this will get the ball rolling for me. Also, i’d like to mention that for the record i’m not interested in the Competitive side of the whole Rsps community. I just picked this up as a means of entertaining people and trying to teach myself. Hope to see you guys around! Cheers!

Nerva – Outwit. Outplay. Outlast.

Read full topic
